text:
**Match Details:** Match 15 of the 2024 Major League Cricket tournament will be played between Seattle Orcas and Los Angeles Knight Riders on Thursday, July 18, at Church Street Park in Morrisville.

**Teams' Recent Performance:** Seattle Orcas are coming off a 23-run loss to San Francisco Unicorns, while Los Angeles Knight Riders were defeated by Washington Freedom by eight wickets in their previous matches.

**Timing and Telecast:** The match will start at 12:30 AM Indian time. In India, the match can be watched on Sony Sports Ten 1 SD & HD TV channels, and live streaming will be available on the Jio Cinema app and website.

* Australian captain Pat Cummins made his debut in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament in the USA, playing for the San Francisco Unicorns.
* Cummins missed the first three matches of the season due to an extended rest after the 2024 T20 World Cup.
* In his debut match against the Seattle Orcas, San Francisco batted first and scored 165-7, with Matthew Short top-scoring with 56.
* Cummins batted at No.8 and remained not out on six.
* In the run chase, Cummins bowled his first over, conceding 14 runs, but recovered to finish with 1-35 from four overs, dismissing Shehan Jayasuriya.
* San Francisco won the match by 23 runs, with Liam Plunkett named Player of the Match for his 3-26.

Match 13: San Francisco Unicorns won against Seattle Orcas by 23 runs. The Unicorns batted first and set a target of 166, which the Orcas failed to chase down. Liam Plunkett was awarded Player of the Match for his excellent bowling figures of 4-0-26-3.

In the match, the Unicorns had a rocky start but recovered thanks to a partnership between Matthew Short and Finn Allen. Sanjay Krishnamurthi's late cameo helped push the total to 165. The Orcas struggled to chase down the target, losing wickets regularly, and eventually fell short.

The Unicorns' captain, Corey Anderson, praised his team's performance and credited Liam Plunkett and Pat Cummins for their crucial contributions. On the other hand, Seattle Orcas' captain, Heinrich Klaasen, lamented his team's batting woes and hoped for a turnaround in their next games.

Next up is Match 14 between MI New York and Washington Freedom at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas, scheduled for July 17th, at 6 am IST (12.30 am GMT).

* There is a Major League Cricket match scheduled for Wednesday, July 17.
* The teams playing are the Los Angeles Knight Riders and the Seattle Orcas.
* The match has a start time of 3:00 PM ET.
* The match will be broadcast on multiple TV channels: Bally Sports, ROOT SPORTS Northwest, and Willow TV.
* The match can also be live-streamed on FuboTV with the International Sports Plus channel add-on package, which offers a free 7-day trial.

**Key Points:**

* Prime Video has acquired exclusive broadcast rights for the 2024 MLC season in Australia and New Zealand.
* All 25 matches will be available on Prime Video in both countries from July 6 to July 29 (local time) at no extra cost to Prime or Prime Video membership holders.
* The second season of MLC will feature international T20 superstars competing alongside the USA's top domestic players from six major cities.
* Notable players participating in the tournament include Pat Cummins, Michael Bracewell, Steve Smith, Travis Head, and Glenn Maxwell.
* Prime Video customers in Australia and New Zealand can watch all live MLC matches on their Prime Video app across various devices.

**Tournament Details:**

* The 2024 MLC season will take place from July 6 to July 29.
* The tournament will feature 25 matches.
* The matches will be played across six major cities in the USA: Dallas, San Francisco, New York City, Seattle, Los Angeles, and Washington D.C.

The defending champions MI New York will play against Washington Freedom in the MLC 2024 tournament on July 17. The match will take place at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas, and will start at 6:00 AM IST. In India, the match will be broadcast live on Sony Sports Ten 5 TV channel, and fans can also stream it online on the JioCinema app and website.

* Australian captain Pat Cummins made his debut in the Major League Cricket tournament on Monday, playing for San Francisco Unicorns.
* In his first delivery, Cummins was hit for a six by Seattle Orcas' Ryan Rickleton.
* Despite the rough start, Cummins' team, San Francisco Unicorns, went on to win the match.

* The San Francisco Unicorns will face the Seattle Orcas in the MLC 2024 on Tuesday, July 16.
* The match will take place at Church Street Park, Morrisville, and will start at 1:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Time).
* The match will be broadcast live on Sony Sports Ten 5 TV channel in India, and fans can also watch the live stream on JioCinema.
* Additionally, the article mentions that Saurabh Netravalkar, an India-born USA pacer, has been performing well in the MLC 2024, having taken a four-wicket haul in a recent match between LA Knight Riders and Washington Freedom.

**Match Details**: MI New York will face Washington Freedom on July 17th at 6:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. The match will be live-streamed on Sony Sports Network and JioCinema.

**Pitch Report**: The pitch is balanced, and teams batting second have won 3 out of the 5 matches played at the venue so far, with a par score of 159.

**Team Form**: MI New York has only one point from their last 3 games, while Washington Freedom remains undefeated with 3 wins, with their new skipper leading them to victories.

**Probable Winners**: MI New York are expected to win this match.

**Probable Playing XIs**: The article provides the probable playing XIs for both teams, with notable players like Nicholas Pooran, Kieron Pollard, and Rashid Khan for MI New York, and Steven Smith, Glenn Maxwell, and Saurabh Netravalkar for Washington Freedom.

**Fantasy Cricket Top Picks**: The article suggests top picks for batter (Steven Smith), all-rounder (Glenn Maxwell), bowler (Saurabh Netravalkar), and wicketkeeper (Nicholas Pooran), as well as an X-factor player (Rashid Khan).

**Pre-Match Analysis**: The article provides an analysis of the teams' recent performances, highlighting MI New York's struggles and Washington Freedom's strong form, particularly with their Australian players shining bright.

In the 2024 Major League Cricket tournament, Australian cricketer Aaron Hardie made an impressive save on the boundary line while playing for the Texas Super Kings against MI New York. Hardie caught a ball hit by MI New York's Rashid Khan and threw it back in time to save six runs.

* The match was a group-stage encounter between MI New York and Washington Freedom in the ongoing Major League Cricket tournament.
* Rashid Khan, playing for MI New York, took crucial wickets of Steven Smith and Glenn Maxwell, providing breakthroughs for his team.
* Rashid Khan bowled a well-disguised googly to dismiss Maxwell, who failed to read the variation and was early onto his shot, resulting in him being bowled.
* Despite Maxwell's dismissal, Washington Freedom managed to score 182/5 in 20 overs, thanks to Rachin Ravindra's hitting.

* The upcoming Match 15 of MLC 2024 will feature Seattle Orcas (SEA) vs Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) at Church Street Park in Morrisville on July 18.
* In their previous meeting, SEA won by 9 wickets against LAKR.
* SEA is currently at the bottom of the MLC 2024 points table with 1 win and 3 losses, while LAKR is 4th with 1 win, 3 losses, and 1 washout.
* Both teams have struggled in the tournament so far, with SEA needing better performances from key players like Quinton de Kock and Heinrich Klaasen, and LAKR requiring their heavy hitters like Jason Roy, Sunil Narine, and David Miller to step up.
* The Church Street Park pitch is expected to favour spinners and a score of around 160 is considered par.
* The probable playing XIs for both teams are listed in the article.
* Based on current form, LAKR are the favourites to win this match.

**Match Details**: MI New York (NY) will take on San Francisco Unicorns (SF) in game 16 of the MLC 2024 tournament on July 18 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Team Standings**: San Francisco Unicorns are currently in third place with 5 points, having won 2 and lost 1 of their 4 matches, with one match producing no result. MI New York are in fourth place, having won 1, lost 2, and had one match abandoned in their 4 matches.

**Pitch Report**: The pitch at the Grand Prairie Stadium is batter-friendly, suggesting a high-scoring encounter, and opting to bat first and posting a big total could be a viable strategy.

**Probable Playing 11**: The article lists the probable playing 11 for both teams, with Devon Conway and Faf du Plessis leading MI New York, and Finn Allen and Corey Anderson leading San Francisco Unicorns.

**Probable Top Performers**: Matthew Short is predicted to be the best batter for San Francisco Unicorns, while Liam Plunkett is predicted to be the best bowler.

**Match Prediction**: The article predicts that San Francisco Unicorns will win the match, regardless of who wins the toss, with predicted scores of 140-150 and 160-170 in the two possible scenarios.

* The 14th match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between MI New York and Washington Freedom on July 17 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* MI New York is currently in 4th place with a win-loss record of 1-3, while Washington Freedom leads the tournament in 1st place with an undefeated record of 3-0.
* In their last match, MI New York lost to Texas Super Kings by 15 runs, with Rashid Khan top-scoring with 50 runs off 23 deliveries.
* Washington Freedom, on the other hand, defeated Los Angeles Knight Riders by 8 wickets in their previous game, with Glenn Maxwell earning the Player of the Match award for his 3/15 in 4 overs.

* Washington Freedom defeated MI New York by 94 runs in their fifth match of the Major League Cricket 2024 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* Travis Head scored 54 off 33 balls, while Andries Gous scored 59 off 48 to power Washington Freedom to 182/5 in 20 overs.
* Washington Freedom's bowlers dominated MI New York, skittling them out for just 88 runs, with Jasdeep Singh taking 3 wickets for 14 runs.
* This victory makes Washington Freedom the first team to qualify for the Playoffs of the second season, with 9 points from 5 matches and a lead at the top of the points table.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom defeated MI New York by 94 runs in the 14th match of the MLC 2024.

**Batting Performance:** Washington Freedom scored 182/5 in 20 overs, with Andries Gous scoring 59 runs off 48 balls and Travis Head scoring 54 runs off 33 balls. Glenn Maxwell and Rachin Ravindra also contributed to the team's total.

**Bowling Performance:** Jasdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 14 runs, while Lockie Ferguson and Marco Jansen claimed 2 wickets each. The Washington bowling attack restricted MI New York to 88 runs in 13.3 overs.

**Tournament Implications:** Washington Freedom has qualified for the playoffs, consolidating their position at the top of the MLC 2024 points table. MI New York needs to address their batting issues to bounce back in the tournament.

* The match between MI New York and Washington Freedom is scheduled to take place on July 17, 2024, at 6:00 AM IST at the Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium in Dallas, Texas.
* The match will be broadcast on Sony Sports Network for TV viewers in India, providing comprehensive coverage with expert analysis and reviews.
* For digital streaming, the match will be available for free on JioCinema, accessible through the JioCinema app or website, offering a high-quality streaming experience with live scores, player statistics, and interactive features.

Washington Freedom, led by Steve Smith, is the only unbeaten team in the tournament, having won three out of four matches, with one ending in no result. New York, captained by Kieron Pollard, has slipped to fourth position after their recent defeat against the Texas Super Kings and needs a win to stay alive in the tournament.

**Pitch Report:** 
The Grand Prairie Stadium pitch is expected to be balanced, with new-ball bowlers likely to get swing, spinners likely to get turn, and batters being rewarded for their strokes. The average first innings score is 145, making it a challenging setting for batters.

* The article highlights a heartwarming moment during the MLC 2024 tournament when Australian all-rounder Glenn Maxwell, playing for Washington Freedom, gave his Player of the Match (POTM) award to a young fan after a match against Los Angeles Knight Riders.
* Maxwell's exceptional bowling performance helped Washington Freedom secure an eight-wicket victory, taking three crucial wickets while conceding only 15 runs.
* The gesture was widely praised on social media, with fans and followers lauding Maxwell for his kindness and sportsmanship.
* Washington Freedom shared a video of the heartwarming moment on their official social media handle, showing Maxwell handing over the POTM award to the young fan and signing an autograph for him.

The Washington Freedom team is set to face MI New York in their next match on July 16 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, with the goal of completing a double over MI NY and securing a spot in the playoffs. The Freedom team has been unbeaten in the tournament so far, sitting atop the points table with seven points from four games. In their last match, they beat the Los Angeles Knight Riders by eight wickets, with Glenn Maxwell and Saurabh Netravalkar taking seven wickets between them and Travis Head scoring a half-century.

Saurabh Netravalkar is currently the top bowler in the tournament, with 12 wickets from four matches at an average of 9.16 runs per wicket and a strike rate of 7.66. Captain Steve Smith is fifth among all batters, with 126 runs from four outings at an average of 126.00 and a strike rate of 140.00.

The Washington Freedom team has won three of their last five matches in the MLC, with one game washed out due to rain. They had previously beaten MI NY by four runs in a rain-affected match at Morrisville on July 6. The upcoming match will be available to watch via live streaming and broadcast on various platforms, including the Monumental Sports Network, Willow by Cricbuzz, and the Jio Cinema App and website.

The article previews Match 14 of the Major League Cricket tournament, which will be played between NY (MI New York) and WAS (Washington Freedom). It promises to provide player records and head-to-head records for the match.

**Launch and Objective**: The MLC T20 cricket league was launched in 2022 with the aim of promoting cricket in the United States, similar to major sports leagues in the country.

**Impact on Cricket in the USA**: The MLC is expected to popularize cricket in the US, making it more accessible and appealing to a broader audience, and potentially creating new fanbases around the country.

**International Partnerships**: The league has formed partnerships with established cricket boards and leagues globally, including Cricket West Indies, Cricket Australia, and Emirates Cricket Board, allowing it to bring in top international players and coaches.

**Challenges and Opportunities**: While the league faces challenges such as infrastructure spending and attracting American sports fans, it also presents opportunities for cricket to establish itself in non-traditional markets and broaden its global reach.

**Economic Impact**: The MLC is expected to have a significant economic impact on the USA, creating jobs, revenue generation, and ancillary industry development, with potential to transform itself into a national economic powerhouse.

**Conclusion**: The MLC has the potential to be a turning point in the global proliferation of cricket, changing the dynamic of how cricket is played in the US, and contributing to its future growth and popularity worldwide.

**Match Details**

* According to the Crix11 astrology cricket match prediction, Washington Freedom will win the match.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom defeated MI New York by 94 runs to become the first team to qualify for the Playoffs of the Major League Cricket 2024 season.

**Washington Freedom's Performance:**

* Batting: Travis Head scored 54 off 33 balls, and Andries Gous top-scored with 59 off 48 balls to help Washington Freedom post 182/5 in 20 overs.
* Bowling: Jasdeep Singh registered his career-best T20 bowling figures of 3/14, while Marco Jansen, Lockie Ferguson, and Glenn Maxwell took two wickets each to restrict MI New York to 88/10 in 13.3 overs.

**MI New York's Performance:**

* Batting: Romario Shepherd scored 25, and Trent Boult scored 16, but the team was bowled out for their lowest total in MLC history.
* Bowling: Rashid Khan and Kieron Pollard took two wickets each.

**Tournament Standings:** Washington Freedom is currently at the top of the MLC 2024 points table with nine points from five matches.

* The 2024 MLC season will be exclusively broadcasted on Prime Video in Australia and New Zealand from July 6 to July 29.
* The season will feature 25 matches, which will be accessible to Prime or Prime Video members at no extra charge.
* The tournament will include top international T20 players and domestic talents from six US cities: Dallas, San Francisco, New York City, Seattle, Los Angeles, and Washington D.C.
* The participating teams will feature a total of 13 Australian and New Zealand players, including notable signings such as Pat Cummins, Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, and Trent Boult.
* The teams and their notable players are:
	+ San Francisco Unicorns: Pat Cummins, Josh Inglis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and Matt Henry
	+ Seattle Orcas: Michael Bracewell and Lance Morris
	+ Washington Freedom: Steve Smith, Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell, Rachin Ravindra, and Lockie Ferguson
	+ MI New York: Tim David and Trent Boult
	+ Los Angeles Knight Riders: Adam Zampa
